title: Project Proxy
description: An innocent man, one assassin and a vile CEO who will hack his way to the top of a lucrative software industry; these are the main characters in this book. Project Proxy tells the thrilling story of a computer programmer’s step up the corporate ladder and the life-threatening situation it came with.Rupert Blake receives a promotion at work, which puts him in charge of the security of the company’s entire computer system. Leadsway, a software development company, is one of the technological companies to proactively ramp up security recently, in response to hacking incidents that are plaguing notable companies. Rupert’s promotion is part of the company’s strategy to protect itself from the now infamous hackers.All seems to be under control, until the hackers attack Leadsway in an unexpected way. Rupert soon learns that the hackers are not only dangerous, but highly organized too, and use intelligent schemes to compromise their target’s security system.
author: Innocent Mwatsikesimbe
